name: Stop the ocean
description:
A massive ice shelf the size of New York City or Rome has completely collapsed in East Antarctica. It fell due to global warming. The water level will rise. Collect 6500$ to build a protective wall and save island La Ficacia! You're their only hope!

Move buildings around to protect them from the rising level. Every building generates money, unless they're underwater!

Controls:

  • - A & D - orbit around the island
  •  - Mouse -  look around
  •  - Mouse Scrollwheel / W & S - Move forward/backwards
  •  - Left click - pick up/release building.

There are 4 difficulties:

  •  - Easy - You can get familiar with the controls and learn the basics.
  •  - Normal - The best difficulty for a casual player.
  •  - Hard - For players, who want to give themselves some challenge!
  •  - Sandbox - A great way to test different strategies.

MADE FOR LUDUM DARE 50
